name: Virus at Home (itch)
description:
Set in the distant future of 2024, this game is a challenging  FPS  that let's  you save the world by defending your home.  

Keep your home clean and your windows closed. Spray the virus away and stop it from getting inside your home. Use every means available to survive and end this new world crisis.

What are you waiting for? Go fight like a man and make your president proud!
